description.en: After—something—changed his life four years ago, Sunny has not left his house once, living in his own reclusive bubble. Hoping for a fresh start for her son, his mother decides to move their family out of town. However, when his childhood friend Kel re-enters his life, Sunny finds himself thrust back into a world he once knew. With only three days before the move, the duo come across familiar faces as they go through town—reawakening a dark past that Sunny has tried so hard to forget.

title.en: Tonari no Seki no Yatsu ga Souiu Me de Mitekuru

altTitles.ja: となりの席のヤツがそういう目で見てくる

altTitles.es-la: La persona sentada a mi lado me mira de esa manera
La persona de al lado me mira con esos ojos

altTitles.uk: Однокласниця що сидить біля мене, дивиться на мене хтивими очима

description.en:
Of course, viewers are excited, but will those being watched feel the same excitement...?
 Brought to you by mmk of 'Love Comedy Quest,' this is a pure love short comedy of the new era about 'neighbors'!

altTitles.ja: かんぺきな街

description.en:
Josh, who is unemployed, takes home on a whim a bundle of answer sheets he sees at a found object collection center. He meets a girl, Mika Nagasaki, who is looking for the bundle, and through his involvement with her and the people around her, he comes face to face with the love he himself is dragged into.

---
Note: Includes an oneshot called Neko Sagashi.
description.pt-br:
Josh, que está desempregado, leva para casa, por capricho, um envelope com provas respondidas que vê em um departamento de achados em perdidos. Ele conhece uma garota, Mika Nagasaki, uma garota misteriosa que está procurando o envelope e, por meio de seu envolvimento com ela e com as pessoas ao seu redor, ele se ver em uma situação inusitada.

Observação: Inclui um oneshot chamado Neko Sagashi.

altTitles.ja: 税金で買った本
Books bought with tax

description.en: Ishidaira is a delinquent who visited the library for the first time since elementary school. But then, he was pointed out by Hayasemaru and Shirai, who works at the library, that he has not returned a book that he borrowed ten years ago. A manga about how Ishidaira went from trying to borrow a book from a library to working there instead.
description.pt-br: Ishidaira é um delinquente que visitou a biblioteca pela primeira vez desde o ensino fundamental. Mas então, ele foi apontado por Hayasemaru e Shirai, que trabalha na biblioteca, que ele não devolveu um livro que pegou emprestado dez anos atrás. Um mangá sobre como Ishidaira passou de tentar pegar um livro emprestado de uma biblioteca para trabalhar lá.

title.en: Motto mo Kirawareteiru Saikyou no Akuyaku ni Tensei

altTitles.ja: 最も嫌われている最凶の悪役に転生

altTitles.en: Reincarnated as the Most Hated Villain

description.en:
Arima Seto is a 23-year-old part-time worker. One day, he is reincarnated as Lobelia Crowley, the most vicious villain in the popular smartphone game Arcadia Fanrasy!

He tries to do good deeds to avoid the catastrophe ending, but he can't stop using his sharp tongue...!?
description.ja:
23歳のフリーター・瀬戸有馬。ある日人気スマホゲームの最凶の悪役、ロベリア・クロウリーに転生してしまった……！　

破滅エンドを回避するため善行を積もうとするが、毒舌口調が止まらなくて―!?

altTitles.ja: きみは、ニーナじゃない
きみは ニーナじゃない

description.en: The only solace for this young man, who has withdrawn into his own shell after a heartbreak, is watching his "idol" on stream. Then one day, he suddenly finds himself hiding from a girl who turns out to be his "idol"...? A life-changing romance between a heartbroken boy and a streamer begins!
description.pt-br: Aoba é um jovem que sofreu um trauma devido a um terrível término de relacionamento. Por conta disso, desenvolveu medo de interagir com outras pessoas, deixou seu emprego e passou a viver fazendo trabalhos temporários, tendo como única alegria assistir às transmissões de sua streamer favorita. Certo dia, ao ser abordado por uma garota que costumava ver em seu caminho de volta para casa, ele acaba concordando em morar com ela? Ele fica surpreso ao descobrir que ela era justamente sua streamer favorita... Assim, tem início um romance transformador entre um rapaz de coração partido e uma streamer!

description.en:
"If you wish, I don’t mind dying."

The tyrant Ludwig Magenta has met his end at the hands of Empress Olive Charlotte. The moment he accepted death, he opened his eyes in the garden where he first met her at the age of twelve. 

If he starts again from the beginning, can he change his tragic life? 

Only time will tell if Ludwig’s quest for Olive’s love will succeed.

altTitles.th: ใต้ร่มวันฝนพรำ

description.en:
Sisters Ju-eun and Hye-jin lived a miserable life. After the death of their mother, their 'father', who had always been absent from their lives, suddenly appeared. Hye-jin, the older sister, agreed to his suggestion: if one of them joins the 'Daesung Group', he will rescue them from their poverty-stricken life. However... three years after entering 'Daesung Group', she dies in vain. This left Ju-eun struggling with despair at her helplessness in preventing her sister’s death. But then, she gets a new opportunity when she is brought back in time and Ju-eun decides to take her sister's place by becoming the daughter of the 'Daesung Group' that killed Hye-jin.

---
Sisters Ju-eun and Hyejin grew up in absolute poverty. After their mother’s death, Hyejin accepts the offer to join their estranged father’s wealthy family. But when Hyejin turns out dead just three years later, Ju-eun is grief-stricken. She grabs at the chance to travel back in time and take her sister’s place where she meets the kind but mysterious Iho.

altTitles.en: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime

altTitles.fr: Moi, quand je me réincarne en Slime

altTitles.en: In Regards to My Reincarnation as a Slime

altTitles.th: เกิดใหม่ทั้งทีก็เป็นสไลม์ไปซะแล้ว

altTitles.zh-hk: 关于我转生后成为史莱姆的那件事

altTitles.ja: 転生したらスライムだった件

altTitles.es-la: Aquella vez que me convertí en Slime

altTitles.ar: ذلك الوقت الذي تجسدت فيه كسلايم

altTitles.tr: O zaman bir balçık olarak reenkarne oldum
O zaman bir slime olarak reenkarne oldum

altTitles.de: Meine Wiedergeburt als Schleim in einer anderen Welt

description.en:
The ordinary Mikami Satoru found himself dying after being stabbed by a slasher. It should have been the end of his meager 37 years, but he found himself deaf and blind after hearing a mysterious voice.  
He had been reincarnated into a slime!  
  
While complaining about becoming the weak but famous slime and enjoying the life of a slime at the same time, Mikami Satoru met with the Catastrophe-level monster “Storm Dragon Veldora”, and his fate began to move.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10044/episode/317350) (U.S. Only), [INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/233-that-time-i-got-reincarnated-as-a-slime), [Azuki](https://www.azuki.co/series/that-time-i-got-reincarnated-as-a-slime), [Coolmic](https://coolmic.me/titles/587), [Manga Planet](https://mangaplanet.com/comic/618e32db10673)
description.ru:
37-летний японец-холостяк был зарезан на улице каким-то мерзавцем-грабителем. Тут бы и истории конец, да всё обернулось иначе, неожиданно он переродился слизью в фэнтезийном мире. Но что может сделать, пускай и разумная, но слизь?  


---

**Links:**  
- [Anime Season 1 on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=20736)
description.es-la: Un hombre, que al tratar de salvar a su compañero de trabajo y su novia, fue apuñalado por un ladrón que escapaba. Mientras moría desangrado escuchó una voz extraña. Esta voz escuchó su lamento de haber muerto virgen y a causa de eso le dio la Habilidad Única "Gran Sabio" ¿Fue esto una burla? Ahora él ha reencarnado como un Slime en otro mundo, ¿Será este el inicio de una emocionante aventura?
description.pt-br: Depois de ser morto por um ladrão que fugia, um rapaz normal de 37 anos de idade se encontra reencarnado em um outro mundo como um slime cego com habilidades únicas. Com um novo nome "Rimuru Tempest" ele chegou depois de conhecer seu novo amigo, o "nível catástrofe", Dragão da Tempestade Verudora, ele começa sua vida de slime em outro mundo com seu crescente número de seguidores.

title.en: Jikan Teishi Yuusha - Yomei 3-ka no Settei ja Sekai wo Sukuu ni wa Mijika Sugiru

altTitles.en: Time Stop Brave - A Game Setting to Save the World in Three Days is Way too Short

altTitles.th: ผู้กล้าหยุดเวลา

altTitles.zh-hk: 停止時間的勇者⸺只能再活三天這種設定對拯救世界來說未免太短了⸺

altTitles.zh: 停止时间的勇者⸺只能再活三天这种设定对拯救世界来说未免太短了⸺

altTitles.ja: 時間停止勇者―余命３日の設定じゃ世界を救うには短すぎる―

description.en:
KUZUNO Sekai was transported to a medieval fantasy game-like world (isekai). He was given a game controller with the ability to stop time and a 3-day countdown timer. Now he has to figure out the mechanics of this game world and clear it in time.

--- 
- The chapters labeled "Nips ver." contain uncensored nipples.
description.fr: KUZUNO Sekai a été transporté dans un monde médiéval de type jeu de fantaisie (isekai). On lui a donné une manette de jeu avec la possibilité d'arrêter le temps et un compte à rebours de 3 jours. Il doit maintenant comprendre les mécanismes de ce monde de jeu et le terminer à temps.
description.ru: Кузуно Секай попадает в средневековый фэнтези-мир вместе с игровым контроллером, с помощью которого он может останавливать время, а также таймером обратного отсчёта, с длительностью в 3 дня. Теперь ему предстоит разобраться в механике этого мира и вовремя пройти его.

altTitles.ja: ちりぢりゆくの

description.en:
Kuno Shio, who is half human and half alien, has a "glitch" that causes his body to turn into a gel-like mass when he gets lustful.
He enjoys attracting girls who gather because of his novelty, but one day, his parents are worried about Shio, who is only interested in splattering, and transfer him to a boarding school for boys.
At the moment when Souma Minato, the class representative who was assigned to take care of Shio, hugs him, Shio somehow splatters...!?
The popular pure love comedy for youth, which was popular on LINE manga, is now a full-color comic with original illustrations!!

altTitles.ja: ファイアーエムブレム エンゲージ

title.en: I Stole the First Ranker’s Soul

altTitles.en: I Stole the Number One Ranker's Soul

altTitles.es-la: Robé El Alma del Ranker Número Uno

description.en:
One day, Son Mo-Ah fell into a dungeon and became a gathering hunter.
Son Mo-Ah, who somehow narrowly escaped death, was going to live a normal life but gets caught up in a dungeon yet again.
In a moment of crisis, she is rescued by Seo Ji-Han, the number one ranker, and succeeds in surviving the situation. Somehow, Son Mo-Ah got entangled in a fateful relationship with said number one ranker.

But he said something really unusual to me.

“Promise me that you will kill all the dungeons bosses in this world, as many as you can.”

What?

altTitles.id: ทรินิตี้เซเว่น 7 จ้าวคัมภีร์เวท

altTitles.ja: トリニティセブン 7人の魔書使い

description.en: Everyday is a normal day in the small town where Kasuga Arata lives. However, everything changed on the day of the Black Sun, and following it, a magician appears before him. The Black Sun caused the Breakdown Phenomenon which destroyed the town where he lives. Because of this, his normal life was artificially reconstructed by a Grimoire that his childhood friend had left. Just what is the purpose of the magician coming to the town? What will he do with the Grimoire's keepsake?
description.pt-br:
Arata Kasuga está vivendo uma vida comum com sua prima, Hijiri, quando um acontecimento misterioso chamado "Fenômeno do Colapso" a faz desaparecer diante de seus olhos. Determinado a erradicar o Fenômeno do Colapso e trazer Hijiri de volta, Arata se matricula na Academia Real Biblia. É uma estrada difícil pela frente, mas nada é impossível quando você tem sete lindas garotas — cada uma mestre em sua própria arte mágica — ao seu lado! A comédia romântica e a história às vezes séria da escola de bruxas começa!

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 7, Cap 30. ]

title.en: Tsukushitagari na Uchi no Yome ni Tsuite Derete mo Ii ka

altTitles.ja: 尽くしたがりなうちの嫁についてデレてもいいか？

altTitles.en: Can I Brag About My Very Devoted Wife To You?

altTitles.zh-hk: 我可以對無比賢惠的妻子撒嬌嗎？

altTitles.en: Can I Be Loving Towards My Wife Who Wants To Do All Kinds Of Things?

altTitles.pt-br: Posso amar minha esposa que quer fazer todo tipo de coisa?

altTitles.en: We Started A So Sweet Newlywed Life

description.en: There's the flower of Takamine High, Hanae Riko, whom every boy admires. Then, there's the plain boy, Niiyama Minato, who got proposed to by that most beautiful girl in school. Without knowing what's happening, the curtain on their newlywed life rises! For some reason, my bride, who's too cute and happily follows me around everywhere, refuses to leave my side...
description.ja:
「わ、私を……っ、あなたのお嫁さんにしてくれませんか……？」　学園一の美少女・花江りこに逆プロポーズされ、わけのわからないうちに、りことの共同生活を始めた俺。だけど、うぬぼれてはいけない。これは契約結婚。――そのはずなのに、「なんでそんな尽くしてくれるんだ？」と尋ねたら、彼女はむうっと頬を膨らませて「湊人くん、ニブすぎだよ……」と言ってきた。え……俺たちがしたのって契約結婚でいいんだよな……？　交際ゼロ日婚からはじまる、ひたすら幸せなだけの両片想いラブストーリー☆

"Wa, watashi o…… ~tsu, anata no o yomesan ni shite kuremasen ka……?" Gakuen ichi no bishōjo Hanae Riko ni gyaku puropōzu sa re, wake no wakaranai uchi ni, Riko to no kyōdō seikatsu o hajimeta ore. Dakedo, unuborete wa ikenai. Kore wa keiyaku kekkon.―― Sono hazunanoni, "nande son'na tsukushite kureru nda?" To tazunetara, kanojo wa mū tto hoho o fukurama sete "Minato hito-kun, Nibu-sugida yo……" to itte kita. E…… oretachi ga shita no tte keiyaku kekkonde ī nda yo na……? Kōsai zero-nichi kon kara hajimaru, hitasura shiawasena dake no ryō kataomoi rabusutōrī ☆
description.pt-br: Hanae Riko, a garota mais bonita da Takamine High, que todo garoto admira. Niiyama Minato, um garoto simples, que foi proposto em casamento por essa mesma garota. Sem saber o que está acontecendo, as cortinas de sua vida de recém-casados ​​sobem! Por alguma razão, minha noiva, que é muito fofa e me segue alegremente por toda parte, se recusa a sair do meu lado...

title.en: Otaku-kun no Seiheki wo Isshou Yugamete Iku Ishuzoku Musume-tachi

altTitles.ja: オタク君の性癖を一生歪めていく異種族娘たち

altTitles.ja-ro: Otaku-kun no Seiheki wo Isshou Yugamete Iku Ishuzoku Musume-tachi

altTitles.en: Interspecies Girls Who Will Twist Otaku-kun's Fetishes for the Rest of His Life

altTitles.ru: Девушки иных рас, пожизненно искажающие сексуальные предпочтения Отаку-куна

description.en:
The main character, Otaku-kun, is awakened to his special sexual proclivities through a series of happening interactions with girls of different races!

Can you keep your reason?
description.ja: 主人公のオタク君を特殊性癖に目覚めさせてしまう、異種族娘たちとのハプニング交流の数々！君は理性を保つことができるか!?

altTitles.ja: 血界戦線 Beat 3 Peat

description.en: Kekkai Sensen: Beat 3 Peat centers around the crime fighting organization "Libra" and their battles in Hellsalem's Lot, formerly known as New York City. Hellsalem's Lot was created in a single night when a portal to the "Beyond" opened, and now it is a paranormal melting pot of monsters, magic, and the everyday mundane city life. It's up to Libra to prevent the horrors of this city from spreading to the outside world.

altTitles.en: How to train your brainrot girlfriend

altTitles.es-la: Tengo una novia con la percepción de la realidad alterada

altTitles.tl: Paano Sanayin ang Iyong Jowang Utakbulok

altTitles.vi: Bạn gái bại não của tôi

description.en: Brainrot Girlfriend

title.en: Yugami-kun ni wa Tomodachi ga Inai - Tonari no Anata to (Unofficial Fanbook)

altTitles.ja-ro: Yugami-kun ni wa Tomodachi ga Inai - Tonari no Anata to

altTitles.en: Yugami-kun Does Not Have Any Friends - With You Next To Me

altTitles.ja: 湯神くんには友達がいない - となりのあなたと

altTitles.en: Yugami Yuji x Watanuki Chihiro Unofficial Fanbook
He Does Not Have Any Friends - With You Next To Me

description.en:
An unofficial addition to Yugami has no friends manga. 

Featuring the web-published interludes of Yugami-kun, as well as secondary works (fan-created stories) of Yuuji Yugami and Chihiro Watanuki set after the final chapter. 

Unofficial Fanbook created by Misumi (mr_ms_maker on X).

Note: Chapters can be read in random order.

altTitles.ja: エビの漫画
地平線

description.en:
Out of nowhere, A mysterious machine rose from the land. This grand machine divided and reshaped the world. Isolating each half. Soon Mankind began to change, evolving into mutants known as Deviants

Long ago, the Earth we live on today was split into two Horizons and Humans developed uncanny abilities known as Deviants. Humans who developed these abilities were launched over The Horizon to the East. The Horizon Project, a system where deviants protected themselves and their side of the world, was launched in response. Almost as if the event was foreseen. This system developed and changed as time went on, resembling a Hero Agency, mitigating chaos all over the East Horizon.
 
Taiga Stelios, the self-proclaimed "Greatest", strives to get his name known far and wide. His goal is to reach the stars he admires and outshine every single one of them.
 
[Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/seakerzx)    [Author's Ko-Fi](https://ko-fi.com/seakerzx)    [Author's Patreon](https://www.patreon.com/Seaker)

title.en: Tensei ni Hakobijin no Isekai Kouryakuhou

altTitles.ja: 転生荷運び人の異世界攻略法

altTitles.en: A Reincarnated Carrier's Strategy for Another World
The Way To Conquer A Different World As A Reincarnated Porter

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei ni Hakobi Jin no Isekai Kouryakuhou

altTitles.id: Strategi Menghadapi Dunia Lain oleh Seorang Carrier yang Bereinkarnasi

description.en: A man who yearns for freedom is reincarnated and he chooses the undesirable job "Carrier"--The fastest way to conquer both women and other world with wisdom and courage! A new erotic fantasy series from Nocturne Novels!

altTitles.pt-br: Aulas de luta de primeira classe

description.en:
The bullied loser Kim Jaehyuk receives 'Top 1 Fighting Tutoring'!
Kim Jaehyuk is a high school student who has been living in despair under the torment of bullies. He's good at studying, but he'd rather be good at fighting.
Then, as if by fate, a 'fighting tutor' comes into his life!
description.pt-br: Kim Jaehyuk é um estudante do ensino médio que vive em desespero sob o tormento dos valentões. Ele é bom nos estudos, mas preferiria ser bom na luta. Então, o destino põe um "tutor de luta" em sua vida!

altTitles.ja: ざつ旅

description.en:
Chika Suzugamori, a rookie manga artist, has been getting rejected every time she submits a new draft.

On the verge of giving up, she suddenly gets the idea of going on a journey-

A journey that heals precisely because it's rough - the ultimate travel comic!
description.ja:
ここではない、どこか。そこに私が待っている——。

新人漫画家の鈴ヶ森ちかは、ネームを持ち込む度に全ボツを食らっていた。
心が折れかけた彼女だが、唐突に旅に出ることを思い立ち——。
ざつな旅だからこそ癒やされる、究極旅コミック！
description.es-la:
Chika Suzugamori, una artista de manga novata, ha sido rechazada cada vez que presenta un nuevo borrador. 

A punto de rendirse, de repente se le ocurre la idea de emprender un viaje... 
Un viaje que se cura precisamente porque es duro: ¡el cómic de viajes definitivo!

altTitles.ja: 伊月くんは正されたい

description.en: Itsuki-kun has someone he’s interested in—a senior, Ririko-senpai, the president of the disciplinary committee! In his efforts to talk to her, he purposely messes up his uniform, but Ririko is always one step ahead—?! A heartwarming, dedicated youth romantic comedy begins!

altTitles.ja: 範馬刃牙

altTitles.en: Baki Hanma - Son of Ogre (Shinsoban Release)

description.en:
The climax of the Baki series, "Hanma Baki", newly re-edited!

Hanma Yuujirou, the world's strongest creature, vs. Hanma Baki, the world's strongest high schooler... A spat between father and son on an unprecedented scale begins here!

'Hayoon' faints when making eye contact with others. She meets two men with whom she doesn’t faint with. However, both seem to strangely dislike Hayoon… Can Hayoon overcome her ‘fainting phobia’ while being with them?

title.en: Isekai no Binbou Nouka ni Tensei Shita Node, Renga wo Tsukutte Shiro wo Tateru Koto ni Shimashita

altTitles.en: I  Was Reincarnated as a Poor Farmer in a Different World, so I Decided to Make Bricks to Build a Castle

altTitles.ja: 異世界の貧乏農家に転生したので、レンガを作って城を建てることにしました

description.en:
In another world where the Royal family power is on decline, and turmoil are lasting.  
  
In a remote village, a young child, who will later be named Ars, is "gardening" and "improving the land." Having the memories of his previous life, he who was fond of "city building" games, initiated to do "selective breeding for crops" and "house constructions" with his own magic to get out of poverty, and finally acquired a "brick creation!" Selling his bricks to a peddler, he obtains a rare egg of a “tamed beast," but can he raise it safely?  
  
Later called as a “Living God,” this is the beginning of the heroic tale of a young boy who founded a nation!

altTitles.th: สูตรลับตำรับดันเจียน

altTitles.ja: ダンジョン飯

description.en:
After his sister is devoured by a dragon and losing all their supplies in a failed dungeon raid, Laios and his party are determined to save his sister before she gets digested. Completely broke and having to resort to eating monsters as food, they meet a dwarf who will introduce them to the world of Dungeon Meshi - delicious cuisine made from ingredients such as the flesh of giant bats, walking mushrooms, or even screaming mandrakes.  
  
---
- **Ranked 1st in the 2016 Kono Manga ga Sugoi! for Male Readers (Shonen/Seinen)**
description.es: Después de que su hermana fuera devorada por un dragón y habiendo perdido todas sus provisiones, Laios y su equipo están decididos a salvar a Farin antes de que sea digerida por la gran bestia. Es así como conocen a un singular enano que los introducirá al mundo gastronómico de las mazmorras: delicias elaboradas a partir de la carne de murciélagos gigantes, hongos caminantes y mandrágoras chillonas.
description.id:
Seorang penjelajah muda, Laios, bersama kawan-kawannya mendapat serangan hebat dari seekor naga jauh di lantai terdalam Dungeon. Mereka kehilangan seluruh uang dan perbekalan, bahkan seorang anggota tim! Walau ingin bergegas kembali dan menyelamatkan rekannya, mereka dihalangi satu masalah besar, “Tanpa makanan dan uang, mereka pasti akan kelaparan di tengah penjelajahan!” Namun, Laios mendapat ide cemerlang, “Kita makan monster saja!”. Slime, kalajengking, basilisk, mandrake, dan kelelawar raksasa… Tidak ada satu monster pun yang luput dari perut-perut keroncongan di Dungeon!! (Gramedia.com) 

[Terjemah Indonesia](https://www.gramedia.com/search?q=delicious%20in%20dungeon)
description.pt-br:
Depois de perder todos os seus suprimentos e provisões e também ter sua irmã devorada por um dragão durante uma expedição na masmorra, Laios e seu grupo estão determinados a salvá-la antes que ela seja completamente digerida pelo dragão.
Mas estando completamente falidos e tendo que recorrer a comer monstros como alimento, eles encontram um anão que os apresentará ao mundo de Dungeon Meshi – uma deliciosa culinária feita com ingredientes como a carne de morcegos gigantes, cogumelos andarilhos e até mesmo mandrágoras.

title.en: Fate/Grand Order - Vengeful Demon's Wail at the Prison Tower

altTitles.ja: フェイト／グランドオーダー監獄塔に復讐鬼は哭く

description.en: From the magazine Type-Moon Ace #12, this is the official oneshot manga adaptation of "Vengeful Demon's Wail at the Prison Tower", a story event from the mobile game Fate/Grand Order.The Master of Chaldea suddenly falls into a coma, his soul prisoner of the Château d'If where sinful versions of his servants lurk. He receives the help of a new comrade: Avenger Edmond Dantès.

altTitles.ja: ブルーロック-EPISODE 凪-

description.en: Nagi Seishiro is a second-year high school student. He is a boy whose habit is to say, "It's a pain in the ass," and he lives his life listlessly. Until his partner, Mikage Reo, discovers his talent in the "Blue Lock," a dormitory for training strikers that aims to win the World Cup for Japanese soccer.
description.fr: Nagi Seishiro est un lycéen de deuxième année. C'est un adolescent qui a l'habitude de tout le temps dire : « C'est chiant », il vit sa vie avec apathie. Jusqu'à ce que son camarade de classe, Mikage Reo, découvre son talent pour le foot, cela les mènera jusqu'au « Blue Lock », un centre de formation révolutionnaire rassemblant les 300 meilleurs attaquants lycéens du pays.
description.pt-br: Nagi Seishiro é um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio. Ele é um garoto cujo hábito é dizer: "Que saco", e ele vive sua vida com indiferença. Até que seu parceiro, Mikage Reo, descobre seu talento em "Blue Lock", um dormitório para treinamento de atacantes que visa vencer a Copa do Mundo em nome do futebol japonês.

altTitles.en: A Tale of a Small Town hardship in Sengoku Era - An Agriculture Comic

altTitles.ja: 戦国小町苦労譚 農耕戯画

altTitles.zh: 战国小町苦劳谭-农耕戏画

altTitles.fr: Les difficultés d'un village à l'époque Sengoku - Une histoire agricole

description.en:
One fateful day, a girl time slipped into the Sengoku Era. It was an abrupt enough event to be dubbed god’s whim, done to sate hellish boredom. The girl has no power to change the world.  
She was a very ordinary, common, and plain girl that can be found anywhere.  And that girl can do no more than a single thing...

Survive the Sengoku Era – that’s all.  
  


---

Adapted from [Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n8406bm/) (Raw)  
Light Novel: [Bookwalker](https://bookwalker.jp/series/62898/)  
Alternative Manga Raw: [Pixiv Comic](https://comic.pixiv.net/works/3714)
description.fr: Shizuko est une lycéenne ordinaire avec des intérêts extraordinaires : l'Histoire et l'agricutlure. Ces passions vont peut-être lui sauver la vie : projetée à la période Sengoku, elle se retrouve au service d'un seigneur excentrique et exigeant : le fameux Oda Nobunaga. Obsédé par l'idée d'unifier le pays en proie aux guerres intestines, il entend bien faire usage des étranges compétences de cette fille venue d'ailleurs. Shizuko parviendra-t-elle à gagner sa confiance ? Retournera-t-elle à son époque ?

altTitles.tr: Cross-dressing yaparken, yakışıklı bir adam beni yürüttü

altTitles.ru: Пока я был переодет в женскую одежду, ко мне пристал красивый парень!

altTitles.zh: 女装上街闲逛被帅哥搭讪了

altTitles.ja: イケメン女子と女装男子

altTitles.en: While Cross-Dressing, I Was Hit on by a Handsome Guy!

altTitles.ja-ro: Josou Shite Machi ni Kuridashitara Ikemen ni Nanpa Sareru Manga

description.en: While cross-dressing, I was hit on by a handsome guy, except she wasn't actually a handsome guy!
description.tr: Ceza olarak crossdressing yaparken yakışıklı bir adamla karşılaştım ve işi pişirdi.
description.pt-br: Por causa de uma brincadeira eu acabei tendo de me vestir de menina, então, sai às ruas, e nesse dia, acabei conhecendo alguém e minha vida está para mudar.

description.en:
"I have to protect you. That's what I thought. At first......"

Giwoo, who took time off school and was looking for a part-time job, happens upon a posting for a high-paying part-time job at a PC room.

When he arrives at the PC room for his interview, he sees crowds of people waiting outside as if it were a famous restaurant.

The reason being: the "boss's face".

A pure and beautiful boss who looks clueless and naïve, like he'd be an easy target of deception. Nervously standing teary-eyed within the wolfpack of onlookers that is always on the lookout for him.

Giwoo, who dreams of being a righteous policeman in the future, makes up his mind from the very first moment to protect the boss from this wolfpack.

But... as time goes on, the boss beings acting strangely...

"Excuse me, Boss... why are you beating up gangsters...?!"

altTitles.ja: キャプテン翼ライジングサン   F I N A L S

altTitles.vi: Đội trưởng Tsubasa - Mặt trời mọc - Chung kết

description.en:
A web-comic continuation of Captain Tsubasa 9th arc: Rising Sun - The Final.

Rising Sun - FINALS is covering the 2nd half of the Madrid Olympics match of Japan VS. Spain and beyond.

The web-comic came to be when on April 2024 mangaka Yoichi Takahashi announced his retirement, ending Rising Sun - The Final official published serialization half-way through the match opting to continue the story at his own pace with storyboard pencil sketches, publishing them on the official Captain Tsubasa World website.

Feng Wu was born with the true blood of the phoenix and was hailed as a peerless genius in all of Junwu. However, her blessing was also a curse...it placed a target on her back. After she was attacked and had her blood stolen, her master Mu Jiuzhou exhausted his spiritual power to save Feng Wu and disappeared right in front of her. Powerless, she could only watch.

Starting again from the beginning, she resolves herself "Zuo Qingyun, our relation is irreconcilable, I cannot live in a world with you in it!"

Watch how our "useless" protagonist becomes a phoenix step by step!
description.fr:
Feng Wu, une jeune fille talentueuse, perd son sang de phénix et devient inutile après avoir été piégée par son ennemi Zuo Qingyuan. Son professeur tombe dans un profond sommeil après l'avoir sauvée. Fei Chai, une étudiante en médecine traditionnelle de l'ère moderne, entre accidentellement dans ce monde fantastique par le biais d'un jeu et prend l'identité de Feng Wu. Il s'avère que Feng Wu a conclu un accord de mariage avec Jun Linyuan, prince du clan Jun Wu. Feng Wu commence une nouvelle vie, utilisant ses connaissances modernes et ses compétences médicales pour aider sa famille, tout en passant ses journées à se cultiver. Elle se fait ainsi de nouveaux amis et tombe amoureuse de Jun Linzhou.

⋆┊Adapté du novel "Godly Empress Doctor" de Su Xiaonuan

altTitles.ja: ビンテイジ

description.en:
"Why am I not popular!?"

Eiji is an unpopular first year university student who is indifferent about fashion. He wants to lose his virginity and has been attending mixers for that purpose but has been failing miserably at them. In the midst of all that, he found a pair of jeans left behind by his late vintage clothes loving father and that's also when he met Ayame, an unfriendly but super cute girl working at a vintage clothes store!

Here's to the beginning of a campus life comedy that started from "vintage clothing" and "love".
description.ja: 古着と美女に出会って冴えないキャンパスライフが変わる。勇気を出せば俺だって・・・！　オシャレと恋に目覚める青春コメディー開幕。さあ、「好き」を着よう！！

altTitles.ja: 川柳少女

description.en:
Yukishiro Nanako is a cute, cheerful high school girl with one peculiar trait: instead of verbal communication, she writes senryu (a type of haiku) poems to relay her thoughts. Together with ex-delinquent Busujima Eiji, they are budding freshmen of the school's Literature Club.  
  
Even though Nanako doesn't talk, with the power of senryu, the adorable pair has no problem enjoying their fun school-life through the tune of 5-7-5 syllables.  


---
description.ru:
Юкиширо Нанако - милая и весёлая старшеклассница со специфичной чертой в общении: чтобы передать свои мысли, она пишет сэнрю (как хайку). Нанако вместе с бывшим хулиганом Бусуджимой Эйджи становятся новыми членами литературного клуба. И пусть девушка так странно разговаривает, но благодаря силе сэнрю эта прелестная пара без проблем наслаждается школьной жизнью.   
  
[Artist's twitter](https://twitter.com/igagarashi)

altTitles.ja: 嘘喰い

description.en:
There are gamblers out there who even bet their lives as ante. But to secure the integrity of these life-threatening gambles, a violent and powerful organization by the name of “Kakerou” referees these games as a neutral party. Follow Baku Madarame a.k.a. Usogui (The Lie Eater) as he gambles against maniacal opponents at games – such as Escape the Abandoned Building, Old Maid, and Hangman – to ultimately “out-gamble” and control the neutral organization of Kakerou itself.  


---

**Links:**  
- [OAV on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=14163)
description.ru:
Есть игроки, которые ставят на кон свою жизнь. Чтобы сохранить целостность таких смертельно-опасных игр, жестокая и могущественная организация «Кагэро» судит их, как нейтральная сторона.
Наш герой — Баку Мадарамэ, «Пожиратель лжи». Игрок, чья цель — переиграть и в конце взять под контроль саму нейтральную организацию «Кагэро».

---

(Source: [readmanga](https://mintmanga.live/pojiratel_lji))
description.es-la: Hay jugadores que incluso apuestan su vida como apuesta. Pero para asegurar la integridad de estas apuestas que ponen en peligro la vida, una violenta y poderosa organización llamada "Kakerou" arbitra estos juegos como parte neutral. Sigue a Baku Madarame, también conocido como Usogui (El Devorador de Mentiras), mientras se enfrenta a oponentes maníacos en juegos como "Escapar del Edificio Abandonado", "La Vieja Doncella" y "El Ahorcado", para acabar jugando más que la propia organización neutral de Kakerou

altTitles.ja: 瞳ちゃんは人見知り

altTitles.it: Hitomi-chan è timida con gli sconosciuti

description.en: One day, the ordinary 2nd year high schooler Yuu Usami accidentally encounters a big girl with a scary look. Turns out she's glaring at him, but why…?! Although Hitomi Takano looks like she's scary and awkward, she's actually a kind and adorable girl. This one shall be a happy, heartwarming slice-of-life comedy.
description.es:
Un día, el estudiante de 2do año Yuu Yusami se encuentra por accidente con una muchacha grande con una mirada temeraria. Resulta que ella símplemente lo está observando… pero ¿por qué? A pesar de que Hitomi Takano se ve espeluznante y huraña, ella en realidad es querida y adorable. Ésta será una feliz y grata comedia de la vida cotidiana.  
  
[![](https://i.imgur.com/oiVINmy.png) Mangaka’s Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/910858)  
[![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Mangaka’s Twitter](https://twitter.com/cyorisukenosuke)
description.fr: Un jour, Yuu Usami – lycéen ordinaire en deuxième année – rencontre une grande fille avec un regard effrayant. Elle a l’air de le fusiller du regard, mais pourquoi…?! Pourtant, même si Hitomi Takano fait peur et est maladroite, elle est en réalité une fille gentille et adorable. Bienvenue dans une comédie/tranche de vie qui va vous réchauffer le cœur !
description.ja:
どこにでもいる平凡な高校2年生の宇佐見君は、ある日、偶然に居合わせた"何やら目つきが悪くていろいろとおっきな女の子"に、なぜか睨みつけられてしまい…!?
見た目は怖くて不器用だけど、実は優しくて可愛い三白眼女子の、楽しくてハートフルな日常コメディ…開幕!!
description.ru: Однажды обыкновенный старшеклассник 2-го года Юу Усами случайно встречает большую девушку со страшным взглядом. По какой-то причине она не отрывает от него глаз, но он ведь ей ничего не делал!.. Хотя Хитоми Такано выглядит страшной и неприветливой, на самом деле она добрая и очаровательная девушка.
description.pt-br: Em um dia comum, um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, chamado Usami Yuu, se encontra acidentalmente com Takano Hitomi, uma garota alta e que tem um olhar assustador. Acontece que ela está olhando diretamente para ele. Mas embora Hitomi pareça assustadora e desajeitada, na verdade ela é uma garota gentil e adorável que simplesmente quer se tornar mais sociável.

title.en: Record of Ragnarok: The Apocalypse of the Gods

altTitles.ja: 終末のワルキューレ禁伝 神々の黙示録

altTitles.ja-ro: Shuumatsu no Warukyuure Kinden Kamigami no Apokaripusu
Shuumatsu no Valkyrie Kinden Kamigami no Apocalypse

description.en: Zeus, supreme chairman of the Council of Valhalla, announces to the gods twelve of the thirteen fighters set to participate in Ragnarok--and is met with the dissenting voices of those who were not chosen. However, Zeus has foreseen this, and immediately declares the holding of another tournament to decide the final spot on the Ragnarok lineup, one which will break the taboo on gods fighting one another. Thus begins the "Revelation" of the untold side of *Record of Ragnarok!*

One day, the lone workaholic Liu Yixia was declared to have abnormal blood stem cells from within and now suffer from acute lymphocytic leukemia. Her life takes a drastic turn and the usual independent Yixia has to now turn to her family for help. In the process of chemotherapy as if fighting a tug-of-war with death, would she truly be able to accept her family's love and care for her?

If I found you within 100,000 people, would I shake hands with a lonely life?

Family, strangers, and blood related relationships.
Taiwan's first blood stem cell topic comic. 

[Initiated by the Kaohsiung Northwest Rotary Club and hosted by Assistance Professor Luo Helin of Tainan National University of the Arts of the project "In Comparison with Us - Blood Stem Cell Database Creation Project", they invited the Gold Comic Award winner Monday Recover and popular author Wu Xiaole to collaborate on the comic strip "Have I found you?". They hope to promote the concept of blood stem cell creation through the form of comics to help more blood cancer patients.]

Hit by a drunk driver and bedridden ever since, Um Tae-sung now only knows the cruel reality of pitying gazes, medical fees, and being half-paralyzed. 

His only escape is reading his favorite web novel, "The Mage That Devours the World". But when the last chapter ends with the hero destroying everything, Tae-sung realizes happy endings don't exist. That is until he wakes up one day as Mord, an extra from the novel!

Now, he’s determined to create the happy ending he’s always dreamed of.
description.ko:
반신불구의 남자, 엄태성.
그의 취미는 오로지 소설을 읽는 것뿐이었다.

그러던 어느 날, 자신이 밤새 읽은 소설 속에 들어와 버렸다?!
게다가 이야기 속에서 그가 맡은 역할은…….
‘엑스트라잖아?’

그런데 이 엑스트라의 설정은 무시할 수 없다,
최강의 혈통, 괴물 같은 재능!

그리고 그에게 주어진 하나의 운명!

[파멸의 운명을 깨부숴라. 그러면 소원을 이룰 것이다.]

세계의 파멸을 막기 위한 먼치킨 엑스트라의 대반란이 시작된다!

altTitles.ja: 上杉くんは女の子をやめたい

altTitles.en: Uesugi-kun Wants to Quit Being a Girl

description.en: Uesugi-kun is a boy who's as petite and cute as a girl. He has a crush on a girl he's known since childhood, but overheard her saying, "Wouldn't Uesugi be totally adorable if he was a girl?!" Uesugi-kun's not as tall as his other childhood friend, Eito, nor is he as good at studies, and now he's suffering from a broken heart. A depressed Uesugi-kun stops by a shrine while running an errand and makes a wish... A love-triangle romantic comedy featuring an overly cute, and now female, protagonist begins!

title.en: Gal to Iinchou ga Guuzen Saikai suru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: ギャルと委員長が偶然再会する話

altTitles.ja-ro: Gyaru to Iinchou ga Guuzen Saikai suru Hanashi

altTitles.en: A Story about a Gal and a Committee Chairwoman Who Meet Again by Coincidence

altTitles.pt-br: A história de uma gal e uma presidente de comitê que se reencontram por acaso

altTitles.es: Una historia sobre una gal y una presidenta de comité que se reencuentran por coincidencia

description.en: After finishing her errands, Marina heads for the bus stop on her way home. However, there she runs into the drunken former committee chairwoman from her high school days. She thinks she doesn't remember her, but while she's taking care of her, she says to her, "You used to avoid me...," which is very meaningful to her...?

altTitles.ja: シルフの花姫

description.en:
In the Land of Wind, in the imperial capital of Ventfleur, Princess Natalia is enthroned after the loss of her family.  

The princess, idolized by her people as a "child of the spirits", only has her family's royal blade to assuage her grief. And in her mourning, she's approached by the cheery and elusive Sister Sara... who declares to stay at the princess' side as her duty, as a sister of the cloth. Or is she after something more...?

So begins the fantasy yuri adventure of a lonesome princess and meddlesome nun!

Note: Was commercially serialized up until chapter 17 when it was cancelled. The author decided to continue the manga via self-publishing.
description.pt-br: Na terra do vento, na capital imperial de Ventfleur, a princesa Natalia sobe ao trono depois da perda de sua família. A princesa, idolatrada pelo povo como a “criança dos espíritos”, tem apenas a espada real como amenizar sua tristeza. E em seu luto, ela é abordada pela feliz e ardilosa irmã Sara... Que declara que irá ficar ao seu lado como seu dever, como parte do convento. Ou ela está atrás de algo a mais...?Assim começa o GL da princesa solitária e da freira enxerida!

description.en:
Stay until you're drunk on me. One day, top counterterrorism agent Hana Lee receives news of her twin brother's passing. Unable to accept the death of her only living relative, she sets out to uncover the truth. Along the way, she gets tangled up with the mysterious Eunseong Yoo and the cold-blooded mafia boss, Giulio Parenti.

Note: The English webtoon was released as R15, it's not R19 like the original novel. It is not confirmed if the Korean release will have a mature (R19) version. This series is the sequel to 페어 트레이드 (Fair Trade) which does not have a webtoon adaptation. The 2nd ML in this story is the ML in The Dilettante

altTitles.ja: 不思議のまゆりさん

description.en:
Yuusuke, a 7th grader, is interested in his friend's older sister for various reasons.
The older sister, while a little strange, is a kind and caring girl.
She's mysterious but is popular with everyone.  
This is an ordinary comedy about Mayuri-san's mysterious everyday life.

Choi Yeon was abandoned by her friends and family. Now a university student, she has started working as a private tutor for a son of a rich family in Seongbuk-dong to hide her poverty. By chance, while working there she met Ji Shinhyuk, the older brother of her student.

Shinhyuk, the real owner of the house, completely ignored Yeon as if she was a mere object. But one day, he began to call on Yeon to perform menial errands. Some days, he would be crude; others, disrespectful. He would provoke Yeon with his indecipherable expression. Despite that, Yeon began to foster a growing attraction toward Shinhyuk, and hoped she would eventually catch his eye...

---
**Official Raws**
[Ridibooks R15 ver.](https://ridibooks.com/books/3093001461)
[Ridibooks R19 ver.](https://ridibooks.com/books/3093001173)

altTitles.ja: 日常

altTitles.th: สามัญขยันรั่ว

description.de: Währendessen der Titel "alltägliches Leben" bedeutet ist der Inhalt alles andere als alltäglich. Es handelt sich um ein komplett bizarres und verücktes "alltags Leben" von einer gruppe High School Schüler. Das Setting ist eine außergewöhnliche Schule, wo du den Rektor sehen kannst wie er mit einen Reh kämpft oder einen Roboter Arm. Wie auch immer, es gibt immernoch normale Geshichten, wie ein Kartenhaus bauen oder einen Test schreiben für den du dich nicht vorbereitet bist. Der Stil ist süß aber mischt auch extreme Ausdrücke und Actionszenen für Überraschende Komedie Einlagen.
description.en:
While the title suggests a story of simple, everyday school life, the contents are more the opposite. The setting is a strange school where you may see the principal wrestle a deer or a robot's arm hide a rollcake. However there are still normal stories, like making a card castle or taking a test you didn't study for. The art style is cute but mixes with extreme expressions and action sequences for surprising comedy bits.

(The original magazine run ends at Chapter 192)
description.ru: Обычная манга про обыную японскую жизнь.
description.uk: Хоча назва вказує на щось буденне, вона є абсолютним протилежним до того, що коїться у манзі. Дії відбуваються у дуже дивній школі, де директор не проти побоксувати з оленем. Або робот, у руці якого сховано тістечко. Звісно не обійшлося без буденності, як от коли вірша забув вивчити і вчиш на уроці. Або картковий дім, який ти вже майже добудував, руйнується вщент! Словом, небуденна буденність.
description.pt-br: Enquanto o título sugere uma história simples de vida escolar, todos os dias, o conteúdo é mais o contrário. O cenário é uma escola estranha, onde você poderá ver o principal lutar com um cervo ou o braço de um robô esconder um bolo. No entanto ainda há histórias normais, como fazer um castelo de cartas ou de um teste que você não estudou. O estilo de arte é bonito, mas se mistura com expressões extremas e sequências de ação para os bits de comédia surpreendentes...
